title: Welcome
text:
This is a template for creating (hand)books styled for VU Amsterdam.
To get started you only need a GitHub account. Visit the repository to create your own handbook üòä

title: Example chapter
text: This is an example chapter. We can also add references (Knuth 1984) or inline references Knuth (1984).

title: Example chapter
text:
Section
This is an example section. Once you include a section this way there will be a table of contents on the page too!
You can use all kinds of helpful tools to highlight information - these are called ‚ÄúCallouts‚Äù






Note



Note that there are five types of callouts, including: note, warning, important, tip, and caution.








Warning with Title



This is an example of a callout with a title.








important with Title



This is an example of a callout with a title.








Tip with Title



This is an example of a callout with a title.








Expand To Learn About Collapse





This is an example of a ‚Äòfolded‚Äô caution callout that can be expanded by the user. You can use collapse="true" to collapse it by default or collapse="false" to make a collapsible callout that is expanded by default.
